projectGridLines.title: Title: Financial Accounting/Marketing analyst
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Financial Accounting/Marketing analyst

Description: The 6-month program designed as an opportunity to learn more about the important role of automation of accounting data

and marketing insights about BITESPEED. This program is designed to give you insight into this division and an opportunity to learn and master the accounting,

technical, and marketing skills in B2B environment of a fast paced startup

Skill sets: Masters of Science in Economics and preferred Bachelorâ€™s in Computer Science. Experience in accounting, marketing is expected

Traits expectation: knowledge of accounting, marketing and basic understanding of automation programming. Exceptional organizational, interpersonal, and communication skill

Expected learning: The aim is to develop and enhance the accounting,

Automation , and marketing skills needed to develop an exciting and rewarding career in this field.

Specific courses required for project execution: Fundamentals of Finance and Accounting, Print Audio Visual and media and some programming courses

Broad project domain: Accounting, Marketing

 

Project area: Finance/Accounting/Marketing

 

Discipline of students: Masters of science Economics and Bachelors in computer science/ EE
